contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} [[File:Binnenbedijkte Maas Mijnsheerenland.jpg|thumb|left|150px|Lake Binnenmaas]] {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Binnenmaas |image_flag = |flag_size = 120x100px |image_shield =Coat_of_arms_of_Binnenmaas.svg |shield_size = 120x100px |image_map = LocatieBinnenmaas2007.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[South Holland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 54.91 |area_land_km2 = 50.34 |area_water_km2 = 4.57 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 28611 |population_density_km2 = 568 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 51.809 |latNS = N |longd = 4.51 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.binnenmaas.nl www.binnenmaas.nl] }} '''Binnenmaas''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Binnenmaas.ogg}}) is a municipality in the western [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[South Holland]]. The municipality had a population of 28,611 in 2007, and covers an area of {{convert|54.91|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} of which {{convert|4.57|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} is water. It is named after the lake of the same name. The municipality was formed on January 1, 1984, by the merger of the municipalities [[Puttershoek]], [[Maasdam]], [[Mijnsheerenland]], [[Westmaas]], and [[Heinenoord]]. On January 1, 2007, the municipality [['s-Gravendeel]] was added to Binnenmaas. The municipality of Binnenmaas consists of the following communities: [[Blaaksedijk]], [[De Wacht]], [[Goidschalxoord]], [['s-Gravendeel]], [[Greup]], [[Heinenoord]], [[Kuipersveer]], [[Maasdam]], [[Maasdijk, Binnenmaas|Maasdijk]], [[Mijnsheerenland]], [[Puttershoek]], [[Reedijk]], [[Schenkeldijk, Binnenmaas|Schenkeldijk]], [[Sint Anthoniepolder]], [[Westdijk]], [[Westmaas]] and [[Zwanegat]]. ==External links== {{commonscat}} *[http://www.binnenmaas.nl Official Website] <!--Please note that not all directions need to be filled--> <!--Please note that preferably only neighboring municipalities or bodies of water should be used--> {{Geographic location |Centre = Binnenmaas |North = [[Barendrecht]]<br>''[[Oude Maas]]'' |Northeast = ''[[Oude Maas]]'' / [[Zwijndrecht, Netherlands|Zwijndrecht]] |East = ''[[Dordtsche Kil]]'' / [[Dordrecht]] |Southeast = |South = [[Cromstrijen]], [[Strijen]] |Southwest = |West = [[Oud-Beijerland]] |Northwest = [[Albrandswaard]] / ''[[Oude Maas]]'' }} {{South Holland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of South Holland]] {{SouthHolland-geo-stub}}
